game.name: 日本事故物件監視協会2 -Japan Stigmatized Property-
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 새벽까지 버틸 수 있겠습니까? 일본의 사고물건을 감시하고 모든 이상 현상을 보고하세요. 보고 누락이 많으면… 임무는 실패합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Can you survive until dawn? Monitor real Japanese properties and report every anomaly. Miss too many… and you will fail.
game.developers: 日本事故物件監視協会
game.publishers: 日本事故物件監視協会, Loxarc Inc.

reviewHighlights.text: This game was pretty kakkig! Notovia did it better in my opinion! Anna mulle rahat takaisin.
The first one was really fun and a mix of "spot the difference" and "eerie unsettling atmosphere". There was a lot of boring moments though waiting fo...
